538810.name: Train Mechanic Simulator 2017
538810.description:
Take Your Opportunity As Real Train Mechanic.

Find locomotives around the game world that needs your help and repair them in one of 3 workshops localized in huge 25 km2 open world.
You will face all types of damages in all genres of trains: Diesel, Electric and even Old-School Steam units.

  • 9 trains to repair in all types: Steam, Electric and Diesel
  • open 25 km2 world full of railways and different locations
  • 3 workshops with more than 1000 parts to repair
  • unique Economy System – you will decide about strategy of repair and ROI of it
[/h2]
[/list]
538810.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 波兰语, 俄语, 捷克语, 匈牙利语
